issue.title: [CF 687] Haunt--Is This Possible
issue.body:
I was wondering if it was possible to only have Haunt come up when my other DoTs(Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction) have at least 8 seconds left on them.  If so, how would I do that.  The forums indicated I should post a ticket for this type of issue instead of posting in the forums.


> Posted by CurseForge user Kamasutro | Imported from CurseForge issue #687 | Raw

comments.body:
Go into the Conditions tab for your Haunt icon, and add "Debuff - Duration" conditions (from the Buffs/Debuffs category) for each of your DoTs that check unit "target", operator ">", and set the slider to 0:08.

I can provide an export string of this if needed, but I won't be around a computer capable of running WoW until tomorrow evening.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Going to close the ticket now. If you still need help, comment here and I will be happy to assist you!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
